data.name: ReBUILD 2020
data.description: Cette année, nous vous proposons un salon de l’innovation digitale au cœur de Nantes, durant lequel vous pourrez découvrir les technologies Microsoft via des sessions mais également des workshops.

data.name: General
data.description: Conferences covering a wide range of web development and software engineering topics.

relatedRecords.name: Monkey Fest USA 2020
relatedRecords.description:
MonkeyFestUSA is a brand-new Developers conference focused on covering all aspects of Cross-platform mobile development within the .NET ecosystem.
We will be covering topics like Testing, Automation, Reactive Programming, UI/UX, Maui, Xamarin.Forms, and other related topics.
